features: Camp Stationery Set: Our 6.9x9.25-inch stationery set features a decorative border, fake stamps, and lined sections in the center, allowing you to add your own text, pictures, and heartfelt messages

Versatile Use: Our camp stationery features 48 lined letter writing sheets and 48 matching kraft paper envelopes; perfect for a wide range of occasions including airmail invitations, travel cards, thank you notes, Christmas letters, love letters, military correspondence, and even scrapbooking
Vintage-Inspired Office Supplies: This aged stationery paper and envelopes set not only adds a touch of style to your desk but also serves as essential office supplies and desk accessories

Printable Design: Our old-fashioned letter writing kit and postage-stamped envelopes are compatible with both inkjet and laser printers, you can easily create your own unique designs and print them directly onto the page
Reliable Quality: This lined stationery with envelopes is crafted to withstand various writing instruments without bleeding ink, including markers, stamps, and pens

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Classic Airmail Traveler Vintage Stationery Set

Travel Stationery Design Preserve the classic art of letter writing with this vintage-designed stationery kit. Perfect for expressing heartfelt sentiments or sending a special invitation to your closest friends and family, this stationery set brings an air of class with its beautiful red, white, and blue border design. Compose Something Special Our lined stationery sheets offer plenty of room to spruce up your design for your recipient. Unleash the writer within and let the creativity flow with ample space for stickers, stamps, or photo prints - all on printer-friendly paper that works seamlessly with most printers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice set. I ordered it so my son and his grandparents can be penpals. It was hard to find non-girly stationary. I like these a lot. The paper and envelopes appear to be a nice quality. The design is really nice, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great quality! looks vintage thick paper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the vintage appearance of the stationary; it will be appreciated by all who get a letter / note from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful stationary with one caveat for USPS mailing
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this stationary over a year ago, along with a couple of other types, to write physical letters to my daughter currently serving in the Navy. I simply love this stationary - the look-and-feel, paper weight, design, and envelop adhesion are all top-notch. I love writing letters on these!Now for the caveat -- I had been sending these to my daughter just fine until a couple of months ago when the USPS started sending them back to me. It turns out that the envelopes are technically shorter than the minimum allowed height for mailing envelopes per the USPS mailing manuals (I think that they are about 1/4" too short - I don't recall the exact measurement that took). The USPS used to handle them but recently they started returning them to me, causing me to have to put the envelope inside a different (I used #10 standard) envelope to get it to go through the mail.The measurements are close enough that it might slip through and get handled by the USPS, but they've been cracking down recently and mine are getting returned now so keep that in mind when buying. (I hope that the manufacturer sees this review and can adjust their envelope size slightly since I really do love this stationary set!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thought I rated this before but in case I didn't I'll do so again. It's a marvelous product. Brings but some of yesteryear when I send a little note to someone. It's for fun not serious business; although, I suppose it could be useful either way. It's lark. Order some and enjoy. Kinky in this day when schools are trying to do away with cursive writing, fountain pens, etc.. A pox on 'em. Get some of these and send notes and letters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this stationary is so cute and nice to write on. all my friends love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Print & Quality Product
reviews.reviewText: I made this purchase to write to my husband during his basic military training. I loved the print and the colors. I used various ink colors while writing to him, all of which were legible even through the designs.The only con I would say to the purchase is because it is smaller than the standard envelope, it seemed to take longer in snail mail transit than by using a standard #10 envelope.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice to write on
reviews.reviewText: These are adorable and I find them really nice to write on. They are just a little bit on the thinner side but they still work nicely for me. They're a great size for writing a letter
Beautiful heavy weight paper. Fully enjoyed using it.

Habe mir das Briefpapier gekauft um mit meinem Patenkind zu schreiben, der gerade in die Schule gekommen ist.Hierfür ist es perfekt. DINA5 Seiten sind nicht zu groß um ein paar Zeilen zu schreiben und das Layout macht auch was her.Ist alles dabei, vom Papier zum Umschlag.Alleinig die Vorderseite des Briefumschlages könnte an einer Stelle etwas weniger Muster haben, dass man die Adresse besser erkennt.Hierfür kann man aber sonst auch gut einen Aufkleber verwenden.Würde ich definitiv wieder kaufen!
Un papier à lettre avec des enveloppes qui interpellent les personnes, car elles sont vintages et pas du tout ordinaire, j'adore !
La carta è spessa e ha le righe perfetta per una lettera bella e ordinata.
Me gusta la sensación al tacto de este papel y lo facil que se hace escribir sobre el.Los sobres me los esperaba un poco mas altos pero si doble el papel en 3 caras entra sin problema.
